name: Regular Fit Cotton-Tencel Stretch Shirt in Soft Blue
description: Crafted from cotton-Tencel with a hint of stretch, the Bishopsgate shirt is the perfect addition to tailored looks. A spread collar adds refined structure to the neckline. Cotton-Tencel with stretch. Spread collar. Buttoned cuffs. Front button placket. Regular fit.

name: Regular Fit Cotton-Sateen Shirt in Mid Blue
description: The Remote shirt is crafted from 100% cotton sateen in a slim fit, offering a sharp, tailored look. Sophisticated double cuffs allow for the addition of cufflinks, elevating the shirt for formal occasions, whilst the cutaway collar adds a modern touch to the design. 100% cotton sateen. Slim fit. Double cuffs. Cutaway collar. Front buttons. Cufflinks not included.

name: Slim Fit Cotton Dinner Shirt in Black
description: The Marcel shirt is tailored for special occasions, crafted from 100% cotton with a subtly textured Marcella bib for a refined touch. Cut in a regular fit, it features a cutaway collar and glossy black buttons for a sophisticated finish. 100% cotton. Regular fit. Marcella bib. Cutaway collar. Button cuffs. Contrasting front buttons.
